'Robert B. Cialdini' is Regentsâ Professor Emeritus of Psychology and Marketing
at Arizona State University.

He is best known for his book on persuasion and marketing, Influence: The
Psychology of Persuasion. Influence has sold over 2 million copies and has been
translated into twenty-six languages. It has been listed on the New York Times
Business Best Seller List. Fortune Magazine lists Influence in their "75
Smartest Business Books."
